project_metadata.description: A synthesized domain model for an e-commerce platform, based on bounded context analysis.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages customer profiles, their authentication, personal preferences, and associated historical data.

entities.name: Customer
entities.description: Represents a user of the system with their personal information, contact details, and loyalty status.

entities.name: Wishlist
entities.description: A collection of desired products saved by a customer.

entities.name: AddressChangeHistory
entities.description: Records historical changes to a customer's address.

value_objects.name: Address
value_objects.description: A physical location, often associated with a customer or order.

value_objects.name: Email
value_objects.description: An email address, ensuring validity and uniqueness.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages all product information, including categories, specifications, images, and pricing.

entities.name: Product
entities.description: An item available for sale, identified by a unique SKU and detailed with descriptions, images, and categories.

entities.name: Category
entities.description: A classification for products, allowing for hierarchical organization.

value_objects.name: Money
value_objects.description: A monetary value with a specific currency.

value_objects.name: ProductImage
value_objects.description: Details for a product image, including its URL and description.

value_objects.name: Specification
value_objects.description: A technical attribute or feature of a product.

bounded_contexts.description: Handles the process of creating, modifying, and tracking customer orders from placement to fulfillment.

entities.name: Order
entities.description: A customer's request for products, including shipping, billing, and total costs.

entities.name: OrderItem
entities.description: A single line item within an order, detailing the product snapshot and quantity.

value_objects.name: Money
value_objects.description: A monetary value with a specific currency.

value_objects.name: OrderStatus
value_objects.description: The current status of an order (e.g., pending, shipped, cancelled).

value_objects.name: Quantity
value_objects.description: A numerical count for items or products.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages the stock levels of products across different warehouses, handling reservations and availability.

entities.name: Warehouse
entities.description: A physical location where product stock is stored.

entities.name: ProductStock
entities.description: The current inventory levels, including reserved quantities, for a specific product at a given warehouse.

value_objects.name: Quantity
value_objects.description: A numerical count for items or products.

value_objects.name: StockStatus
value_objects.description: The availability status of a product (e.g., in stock, out of stock, low stock).

bounded_contexts.description: Manages the processing of payments, refunds, and customer payment methods associated with orders.

entities.name: Payment
entities.description: A record of a financial transaction for an order, including status and method used.

entities.name: Refund
entities.description: A financial reversal of a payment, detailing the amount and reason.

entities.name: PaymentMethod
entities.description: A customer's saved method for making payments (e.g., credit card, digital wallet).

value_objects.name: Money
value_objects.description: A monetary value with a specific currency.

value_objects.name: PaymentMethodInfo
value_objects.description: General information about a payment method, potentially masked for security.

value_objects.name: PaymentStatus
value_objects.description: The current status of a payment (e.g., pending, completed, failed).

value_objects.name: RefundStatus
value_objects.description: The current status of a refund (e.g., pending, completed, rejected).
